
# Slot: required


true means that the slot must be present in the loaded definition

URI: [linkml:required](https://w3id.org/linkml/required)


## Domain and Range

slot_definition &#8594;  <sub>0..1</sub> boolean

## Parents


## Children


## Used by

 * anonymous_slot_expression
 * slot_definition
 * slot_expression
